@hisanhunais It seems like this is a copy of this component
Can't we reuse it here ?

You might have taken this from an existing component, but this injects and higher-order components are a bit old with newer react hooks, Shall we replace injectIntl and withRouter , withStyles with their respective hooks
there is no usage of withRouter HOC , so I think we can remove that as well
